english_translation: And Waiz-Allah ibn Dabaah. Amr ibn Marzuq said: Shu'bah told us, from Hamzah al-Dabi, from Anas ibn Malik. He said: Whenever we descended at a stopping place, we would glorify (Allah) until the luggage was unloaded, meaning we would pray.
